description: This version of the  Person Facepalming emoji has the  Medium Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Moderate Brown Skin Tone on sup
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the person facepalming emoji with a medium skin tone features a figure with smooth, rounded features and a naturalistic skin hue, showcasing Apple's commitment to inclusive design. The hand is depicted with soft shading, covering the face with a gesture of exasperation or disbelief, all rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading. This emoji is a universally understood visual for moments of utter frustration, embarrassment, or the realization of a silly mistake, perfect for conveying those relatable human reactions within the Apple communication sphere.
